name: Culprit
description:
Story:

In Culprit, you play as Leena Wohl, a child that was arrested along with her mother, they were sent to the closest prison available, which also happened to be the most secure in the world, named Lamcrad,  months later, the place was invaded by Monsters and was left in ruins, making prisoners and guards run for their lives in the massive labyrinth-like prison, Leena awakes after the attack, and her mother is nowhere to be seen, instead, a suspicious figure stood beside her, and this spirit offered his help, without many options, the girl needs to put her trust on him to escape the horrors of the decaying Lamcrad.

Game:

Culprit has a small map to roam, with a monster on it, there is nothing else to do but to check on the big guy. :)

Development notes: 

From this project onwards, I act as a member of Gamer Slam.

For a first 3D game, Culprit does it nicely, the game lacks the mechanics and story, but we are sure that we will come back to develop Culprit.
